summary: This file, AINetAbsCMVUtil.h, defines a class for various methods related to abstracting and working with motion vectors (mvNodes). It provides functions to get the absolute urgentTo and delta values of two mv nodes, as well as to calculate the initial direction index strength of an abstract mv. This file has undergone changes over time, including updates to how the default strong index is determined.
